documents.document:
Welcome to the New York Shows

New York City boasts of numerous sources of entertainment for the visitors, the primary ones being cinemas, amusement parks, circuses and Broadway theaters. The old Broadway theaters of NYC hold an important significance for the residents as they represent the illustrious history of the city.

If you are planning to visit “The Big Apple”, it would be a faux pas if you don't watch New York Shows in these beautifully built theaters. New York has a whole region dedicated to theaters popularly known as “Broadway theatre district”, which itself is a well known tourist attraction. The Broadway theaters that ought to be on every tourist's list are: Winter Garden theater, Imperial theater, New Amsterdam theater and Gershwin theater.

Inaugurated in 1903, New Amsterdam is one of the oldest surviving legitimate theaters in New York City, along with New Victory, Hudson and Lyceum Theatre. Built of carved stone, plaster and wood; decorated with intricate arrays of murals and tiles, New Amsterdam reminds the visitors of New York of the early 20th century.

Another place where you can catch the famed New York Shows is the Imperial Theatre at West 45th Street. Originally built as a theatre screening musical comedies, Imperial has played a number of long running plays during its ninety year existence. Other famous theatres include The Winter Garden, which was built by the famous architect Herbert J Krapp. Winter Garden currently plays “Mama Mia”, having sold the tickets for whole of the next year in advance.

Apart from the above, the other famous theaters include Gershwin, Foxwoods, Eugene O' Neil, Vivian Beaumont, Majestic and Palace theater. The best way to visit all such New York City attractions is through well organized New York Tours. If you want to know more about the celebrated Broadway theaters in NYC, do visit NewYorkTotal.com.

For more information, refer site www.newyorktotal.com

Must-Watch New York Attractions

New York City never disappoints to amaze the tourist, who visit the city in hordes every year. There are several New York City Attractions, that should find a place in the wish-list of every urban tourist.

The major attractions within the confines of the New York City include Statue of Liberty, Empire State Building, Times Square, Brooklyn Bridge, Wall Street, Top of the Rock, Chrysler Building, South Street Seaport and the Staten Island Ferry. The two attractions that should definitely be part of every New York Sightseeing trip are Empire State building and the Statue Of Liberty.

Imprinted in the mind of every Hollywood movies fan, Empire State building reminds one of the giant ape called King Kong, climbing on to the top of the building to get back his lady love. The popular culture references apart, the 102 stories tall structure is a symbol of New York's business spirit and wealth, harboring the offices of some of the top American corporations. The building which remained the highest in the world for nearly four decades, is famous for its excellent architecture and has won a number of awards for it.

Celebrating the American spirit of freedom, the Statue of Liberty is one of the most recognizable monuments in the entire world. Located at the Liberty island in New York Harbor, the statue was a gift from France, sculpted by the famous French architect, Frederic Bartholdi. The monument represents Libertis, Roman Goddess of freedom, holding a golden torch of liberty in her hand. If one is planning to visit the New York City, seeing the Statue of Liberty should be part of the tourist plan.

Other than Empire State Building and the Statue of Liberty, there are a number of other New York City Attractions one must watch.

To know more about the major attractions in New York City, do visit: www.newyorktotal.com

New York clubs – A place to enjoy and have fun

The vibrant city of New York has achieved global fame for the large number of hotspots for shopping that are present in this city. People travelling to this city generally don’t miss to go for shopping and buy something for oneself or to carry a gift for some dear ones. There are a large number of New York shopping places in the city.

Tiffany’s, Woodbury Common Premium Outlets, Bloomingdales and Macy’s are among the famous shopping hotspots in New York. One can find all types of things in these shopping outlets, ranging from toys to funeral wear and elegant Jewellery to trinkets. There are large number of other services too that are present in these shopping complexes. Some of other services that are available here include foreign shipping, interpreter staff and currency exchange. New York shopping has gained wide popularity all over the world.

There are a wide range of things to do and places to visit in New York. Large number of bars and night clubs make the night life of the city quite lively and bubbling with joy. If a person wishes to party and have fun at any point of time, whether day or night, these clubs are always open. Music and dance accompanied with delicious food make the environment of these clubs really mesmerizing and leave the people enthralled.

New York clubs make the people forget their worries and sway all night long. Large number of clubs from classics to hip hop and rock & roll are present in the city. With so many clubs, one better than the other present in the city, it is really difficult to choose where to go and which one to leave.

For more information, please visit :www.newyorktotal.com.

Get mesmerized with New York shows

New York also referred to as the city of skyscrapers, is a business centre and a tourist hub. New York is a place steeped as much in scenic beauty as in history. New York City attractions have made this city a hotspot for tourists from all over the globe.

There are a number of place to visit in New York. The Statue of Liberty, located on the Liberty Island is one such great attraction present in New York. It was a gift from France to the United States and is a symbol of International friendship. The Empire State Building is another very good place to visit which is a 102 story skyscraper and was among the last sky rises to be built before the great depression. The Rockefeller Center, The Brooklyn Bridge, The Central Park and The American Museum of Natural History are some other must visit New York City attractions.

In this era of Internet when people find it more interesting to spend time in chatting and surfing the Internet, than to go to theatres, New York shows are still very popular. The New York Broadway shows is something that no one travelling to the city wants to miss. There are about 40 Broadway theatres in New York where world class actors perform, and bring before the audience a spectacular show. One can find shows of all categories, be it comedy, horror or romantic. The New York Broadway shows have been entertaining audience for the past many years and have also won many awards. A tour to New York cannot be complete without going to its Broadway shows.

For more information, refer site www.newyorktotal.com

New York Broadway Shows

New york broadway show Guide makes it easy to purchase tickets to all of New York's great Broadway and off-Broadway shows. Our Broadway Show Guide Poppins, Wicked, Mamma Mia!, Billy Elliot: The Musical etc

New York Broadway Shows

New York City is a unique combination of historical and modern relevance. It is full of buildings of contemporary value, apart from the architectural marvels from 19th and early 20th century. The city attracts a large number of tourists, coming here all round the year to see the popular monuments through well organized New York Tours.

A great place to be in “Big Apple” is the Broadway theater district, renowned for having a number of landmark theaters. The perfect avenue to watch the famous New York Broadway Shows is the Eugene O' Neil theater, situated at 230 West 49th street . The theater has a simple facade outside, but when one step into this Shubert built and Krapp designed structure, they are sure to be spellbound by the exquisite Adamsque interiors. Opened for public viewing in 1925, Eugene O' Neil theater has seen the curtains fall for more than 3000 times during its lifetime.

Another place representing the golden age of American theaters is the Shubert Theater, located at 225 West 44th Street adjacent to Broadway. This theater is named after Sam S. Shubert, belonging to one of the top theatrical producing families of early 20th century America. Designed by the ace architect of that era, Henry Beaumont Herts, the Shubert Theater is pleasure to see with beautiful exteriors reminiscent of the Venetian Renaissance style. Stared in 1913 with a series of Shakespearean plays, the theater currently enjoys the status of being a designated New York City landmark.

Apart from the Eugene O' Neil and Shubert Theater, NYC also has many other historic theaters inside its premises such as New Amsterdam, Booth theater and Palace theater. The best way to experience the magic of all these historical places is through well planned New York Tours.

If you want to know more about the historical buildings in New York, do visit www.newyorktotal.com.

New York Shopping – An Amazing Experience

New York is one destination that is highly recommended as a must visit city for any tourist. The city is full of delightful surprises and offers a platter full of interesting attractions for tourists having diverse interests. The world famous attractions of this city are the Statue of Liberty, Central Park, Rockefeller Center, Empire State Building and Times Square, among others. The city is termed as a haven for music lovers as they can have a gala time at the music fests or tours conducted in Harlem and the East Village. Visitors can enjoy the pleasure of listening to jazz, gospel music, rock and roll, rhythm and blues and various other kind of music at these tours. Those looking forward to enjoying the popular and flourishing nightlife of New York city can do so at various New York clubs.

Cielo, LQ, Marquee New York, VIP Club and Webster Hall are renowned New York clubs that can be visited by nightlife and party lovers. Cielo offers soulful music while foot tapping music hip-hop, classic soul and R&B music can be enjoyed at LQ. The Webster Hall, on the other hand, provides entertainment through live music. The nightlife at New York clubs will surely make the youth want to come back for more.

Those who love to splurge will find this city a haven. New York shopping places like Bloomingdales, FAO Schwarz, Macy's New York City, Saks Fifth Avenue and Woodbury Common Premium Outlets offer best deals to the shopaholics.

New York can be visited at any time during the year as the city offers excellent discounts and deals on accommodation and cab fare. Furthermore, the locals of this city are cheerful and friendly people who do not indulge in racial discrimination.

For more information, please visit :www.newyorktotal.com

New York Broadway Shows – A Treat to Eyes

Home to some of the world's most striking, recognizable and wonderful landmarks, New York is a city that offers exotic as well as informational tour. From the extravagant array of museums to the world’s most respected financial centre and glamorous fashion streets to commercial hotspot, the city moulds more legendary icons into one compact area than any other place through out the world. Each and every corner of the city features its distinctive roster of must to see destinations. Featuring comprehensive cultural listing on all museum, universities, parks, beaches, parades and festivals, classical and operas, New York Tours will never disappoint travellers of any age group.

Giving glimpses of the heritage of the city, the museums or the informational time capsules let the history buffs gather a lot about the city that too in a variety of context. Moving around the city, one can enjoy the classical sculpture of Statue of Liberty, located on Liberty Island in New York Harbor. Spending the day learning the city, one can also enjoy shopping at reputed destinations, where fashion figureheads display their master piece exhibiting current and most fashionable trends.

A tour in the city that never sleep is incomplete until one has experience most complete, exciting and satisfying performances of artists in New York Broadway Shows. Based on legendary stories, songs and plays, these musical tales leaves the audiences spell bounded. As the music soars, the spectacular performance packed with magical effects brings every character to life. With 40 professional New York Broadway shows theaters located in the Theatre District centered along Broadway, and in Lincoln Center, in Manhattan, the city promises of an entertaining and pleasant evening.

For more information, refer site www.newyorktotal.com

The Attractions of the New York City

New York certainly is one destination, where almost everyone would want to visit at least once in their lifetime. The commercial and business capital of the United States, it is often referred to as the “City that never sleeps”. The cosmopolitan city of New York boasts of diverse cultures due to the immigrants from different parts of the world. Numerous New York attractions have been forever etched in the minds of tourists who have visited this wonderful city.

The city of New York is often referred to as that of skyscrapers. One amongst them, without which every picture of the city is incomplete, is the Empire State building. This iconic building was constructed way back in 1931 and remained the tallest building in the world for four decades. The skyline of New York looks magnificent in the night, with the flood lights positioned on the top of this 102 storied building.

The Times Square is another one of the famed New York Attractions. It is a prime location for theatres and hotels, and also offers the best in entertainment and shopping facilities. One can also visit the iconic Statue of Liberty, which was gifted to the Americans by the French. This grandiose statue is located on the Liberty Island in New York harbour. Some of the other places worth a visit are Central Park, Rockefeller Centre, Brooklyn Bridge, American Museum of Natural History, Children’s Museum and others.

New York Broadway Shows are known around the world for their spell bounded musical tales. Based on legendary stories, songs and plays, these shows are presented by professional artists, who bring the characters to life with the rising nodes of music. On the Theatre District across Broadway, 40 professional theatres are located, that present entertainment options for both kids as well as adults.

Whether art, architecture or just entertainment, New York certainly has something in store for everyone.

For more information, refer site www.newyorktotal.com

New York Sightseeing – A Tour That Has Something for Every

New York or better known as a City that never sleeps has everything in its store for everyone. From history buffs to mere sightseers, every day numerous travelers are welcomed by the city. Each corner of the city is adorned with some of the legendary and iconic structures. Prioritizing the places, one can catch hold of the best of New York City attractions.

The one and undoubtedly the best of New York City Attractions is the Statue of the Liberty. Steeped in historical significance, this classical masterpiece was given by France to the United States as a symbol of gratitude. The other symbolic structure of the Americas is the Empire State Building, which is counted as the tallest building of world for four decades after its erection. Featured in countless movies and states picture, this 102 storied building offers a stunning view of the night sky with its flood light.

This city of skyscrapers also has a vast array of extravagant Museum. Some of these dates back decades act as an informative time capsule to learn about the history of the city its art and culture in a variety of context. So to explore the big apple curious travelers can visit to one of the most grandiose, the American Museum of Natural History, Museum of the City of New York and many more. One can also spend the day with their kids in The Children's Museum of Manhattan.

A traveler can also enjoy the spell bounded performances of the professional artists showcased in the world renowned Broadway shows. Be it enjoying the twinkling lights of the Time Square Building, walking over the age old Brooklyn Bridge or experiencing the extraordinary New York Sightseeing cruise, the city has hundreds of things to do.

For more information, refer site www.newyorktotal.com

Enjoy the magnificent sights and renowned landmarks New York

Every year millions of travelers visit the New York city to be a part of this famous landmark on the globe. Entitled as a city that never sleeps, it has everything from art, culture, fashion and entertainment to offer to its visitor. With so many attractions located at each corner of this big apple, one needs to take a guided New York Tour to not miss the fun and excitement.

Surrounded with five boroughs, the city has a number of skyscrapers, which have won several awards for their architectural excellence. Among all the most renowned and visited is the Empire State Building, which is the centerpiece of the city photographs. After its construction, this 102 storied building remain world's tallest building for over four decades symbolizing the liberty and grandeur of the United States. The next in the row of comes the Times Square Building, Rockefeller Center, The Chrysler Building and many more.

Learning the history from its extravagant array of museum and historical landmarks, one can also enjoy the delicious treat of some of the finest dining places while roaming on the streets of the city. For shopping spree, the city is just a heaven. The city has number of iconic stores and signature shopping establishments, which has the best of everything that the big apple has to offer to its visitors.

Visiting the city, it is said that never miss the chance to experience the spell bounded New York Shows. Renowned as Broadway shows, these are musical tales based on the legendary plays, songs, stories or award winning movies.

The New York Tour never gets completed till the symbol of freedom, The Statue of Liberty is visited. Surrounded by water from all corners, this masterpiece is given by France to the United States as a gift of gratitude.

For more information, refer site www.newyorktotal.com

New York clubs and New York City Attractions are worth check

To celebrate engineering marvels with buildings, spectacular landmarks and historical edifices designed by eminent architects, a tourist won't find a place better than New York. The most popular New York City attractions are the Empire State Building, Times Square, Rockefellar Center, Central Park, Brooklyn Bridge, South Street Seaport, Chrysler Building and Staten Island Ferry.

New York City also homes a number of museums and galleries that are of great importance. The American Museum of Natural History, located in Manhattan's Upper West Side is one of the largest museums that exhibits impressive artifacts. The Hall of Ocean Life, Human Biology and Evolution Exhibit, The Hall of Minerals and Gems, The Hall of Meteorites, Famous Fossil Exhibits, The Art of the Diorama, The Recreation of Nature, and Rose Center and Planetarium are the various sections that form this museum. Guggenheim Museum, the Brooklyn Museum of Art, Museum of Modern Art located in Midtown and Whitney Museum of Modern Art are some of the other most popular museums in New York.

For tourists who are seeking a place to spend a fun-filled evening, New York City has lots to offer. From New York Clubs to an extensive range of eating and partying hotspots, tourists will definitely be spoilt for choices. For tourists who are looking for a late meal, there are plenty of eating joints that stay open till late night. The upscale New York Clubs are known to be vibrant and colourful. Tourists can enjoy many live performing acts in these clubs. Most of them offer happy hours as well, during which tourists can avail discounts on food and beverages.

To discover New York more at its best, visit www.newyorktotal.com

New York Sightseeing Tours: A Lifetime Experience

People from every corner of the world visit New York City, with the expectation of being amazed by the charm of the city. With its architecturally brilliant structures, picturesque sea view points, shopping avenues and great food junctions, this city promises a lot to the visitors. It is advised to carefully plan the New York sightseeing tour with the help of booking agencies and travel websites.

Irrespective of the fact that one is on a business trip or for leisure vacation, these planners design various packages that give a wonderful rejuvenating experience to travelers within their budget. Understanding the preferences of the tourists, these booking agents design http://www.newyorktotal.com/tours] New York Tours[/url] that can indulge the traveler into various shades of the city including history, art, culture, city life and many more.

Moving around the city, one can enjoy the colossal structure of the Statue of Liberty, which is located on Liberty Island in New York Harbor. Given as a token of gratitude to United States from France, this statue has become the national symbol in late nineteenth century. In addition to this, the city has various other architectural masterpieces including the Times Square Building, the Empire State Building, Rockefeller Center, Top of the Rock and Chrysler Building.

The city has also an extravagant array of museums for the history buffs and curious tourists. Serving as well structured and informational time capsules, these museums allow the travelers to become aware of influential point in the city's history.

One can also enjoy the musical performances hosted by Broadway shows in their New York Tours. Based on legendary plays, songs and stories, New York Broadway Shows leave the audiences spell bounded. Representing the highest level of commercialism, these theaters serve as a perfect destination for enjoyment and entertainment for both adult & kids.

New York City attractions beckon tourists to its awe-inspiri

New York, lovingly called as The Big Apple, is among the largest centers of trade and commerce in the United States. Also referred to as the city of skyscrapers, New York is home to some of the tallest buildings of the world. The city being equally steeped both in history and scenic beauty, is thronged by tourists and holiday makers from all over the globe.

There are a large number of New York city attractions which attracts people to its mesmerizing beauty and leaves them enthralled. The Statue of Liberty which stands on the liberty island is visited by a large number of people every day. This statue is of historical significance as it was a gift from France to the United States and is a symbol of friendship between the two.

The 102 story Empire State Building, The Rockefeller Center and The Brooklyn Bridge are some other New York city attractions visited by people from all over the world. The Central Park, located in the city, is a National historic park which is visited by around 35 million visitors every year and is considered among the most visited urban Park in the United States. Apart from these, the city also has many museums which brings before its visitors the past and the present of USA.

To add to the joy of the visitors, the vibrant city has many bars and clubs where the tourists can enjoy themselves. Whenever people plan to have fun and party, be it night or day, the city with a large number of New York clubs is ready to make the people sway to the rhythm of the music. Music and dance in these clubs along with excellent cuisine are sure to leave the visitors mesmerized.

New York City Attractions – A Must Visit For The Wanderlus

Tourism is an industry that can contribute generously to the economic growth of any country. The city of New York has grabbed this opportunity and promoted tourism extensively. This measure has resulted in the city becoming one of the most visited cities of the world. Being the fourth largest city in the world, New York offers tourists an experience which is worth spending their money. Some of the popular New York City attractions comprises The Statue of Liberty, Empire State Building, Rockefeller Center, Central Park and Times Square, to name a few. Fifth, South Street Seaport is a luxury shopping destinations and New York Botanical Garden is one of the other interesting destinations.



In addition to the above mentioned world famous destinations, New York also provides tourists various other reasons to visit this city. While enjoying New York City attractions one can also participate in the fulfilled food tours and film festivals. Withholding a rich taste in music, New York offers the tourists an opportunity to enjoy jazz, gospel music, rock and roll by attending various music tours that are organized in Harlem and the East Village. Furthermore, cuisine of all kinds of ethnicity like Jewish, Italian and middle eastern can be savored by attending food tours. These tours are organized by New York Food Tours and Rum and Blackbird Tasting Tours.

Film festivals and Broadway shows are other forms of entertainment. For sightseeing purposes, tourists have a variety of options to choose from. These include ship cruise, helicopter tour, limousines on rent, double decker bus, horse drawn carriage rides and bike tours.

New York attractions can be easily visited at any time of the year as the rates for renting a room and cabs is the same throughout the year except for a few festive occasions like Christmas and New Year's. Visiting New York is safe as the inhabitants of this city are friendly and do not engage in racial discrimination.

For more information, please visit www.newyorktotal.com.

New York Sightseeing – A Tourists Delight

New York, the city of skyscrapers, also called “The Big Apple” has emerged as the centre of attraction for tourists from all over the world. This city of dreams and opportunities has a diverse range of attractions like no other city does. New York sightseeing is something that everyone travelling to this city loves to do.

The very famous Statue of Liberty, Empire State Building, Madame Tussaud’s Wax Museum, Central Park and Times Square are just a few hot spots, which have captured the attention of tourists. These attractions have made New York sightseeing distinct and very famous throughout USA and abroad. Located on the second floor of the famous Empire State Building is the New York Skyride, which off lately has become the best tourist attraction and a must see for the visitors. New York Skyride is the only virtual tour simulator in the city and takes visitors on an aerial New York tour. The Museum of the City of New York brings before its visitors the past, present and future of this grand city. The Central Park is yet another place to hangout which receives approximately thirty-five million visitors annually and is the most visited urban park in the United States.

The New York Broadway shows are the best of its kind that attracts a large number of tourists to this city. There are a number of Broadway theatres in New York City where one can catch any type of show of his own choice, be it musical or romantic, horror or comedy. These New York Broadway shows will simply leave the tourists mesmerized. People visiting this city definitely go to the famous Broadway shows and have a good time there.

For more information, refer site www.newyorktotal.com

New York- A Perfect Place for Sightseeing

New York, also referred to as the cultural capital of the world, is the most populated city in the United States. Its rich culture and history makes it a great destination to travel to.

There are a number of New York attractions that must be included in a tourist’s itinerary. The Rockefeller center is one of the skyscrapers of this city from where the tourists can enjoy the panoramic view of the city. The Rockefeller center has skating rinks, shops and restaurant where the tourists can enjoy themselves. The Statue of liberty is another iconic landmark in New York. Located on the Liberty Island, The Statue of liberty is a symbol of international friendship as it was gifted to the United States by France.

The Empire State Building with 102 storeys gives an amazing view at night when the whole city is lit up. It has an observatory on its top most floor which gives a view that spans about 80 miles. These New York attractions are always crowded by tourists. So, it is advisable to make reservations well in advance.

There are about 28,000 acres of municipal parklands in New York which makes it a perfect place for nature lovers. The Central Park is one of the most famous parks in New York. It has several lakes, a Conservatory garden, two skating rinks and even a zoo. This park provides a very soothing environment. This city also has large number of museums such as Guggenheim Museum, Museum of Modern Art and Metropolitan Museum of Art. The Museum of Natural History features dinosaur exhibits, thus making it a good place for science geeks. These places and attractions make New York sightseeing very enjoyable.

For more information, refer www.newyorktotal.com
